title: To Be Young And In Love, On a Budget
teaser: Four young voices from Youth Radio explore the annual question "What do I give that special person on February 14th?"
contentencoded:
The struggle to find the perfect gift on Valentine’s Day is looming, especially for high school and college students who usually don’t have a whole lot of money to spend.

From Youth Radio, Rafael Johns, Catory Goodman, Savannah Robinson, and Tylyn Hardamon explore the perennial question “What do I give that special person on February 14th?”

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
